scripts.build: pnpm run build:wasm; pnpm run build:js
scripts.build:wasm: mkdir -p dist; cp "$(go env GOROOT)/misc/wasm/wasm_exec.js"  "$(go env GOROOT)/misc/wasm/wasm_exec_node.js"  dist/; GOOS=js GOARCH=wasm go build -o dist/generator.wasm -ldflags="-s -w -X main.Version=$GITHUB_REF -X main.GitCommit=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD)" entity-generator/cmd/generator.go
scripts.test: pnpm run test:go && pnpm run test:js
scripts.pubdir: pnpm run build; rm -rf pubdir ; mkdir -p pubdir; cp -pr .gitignore .npmignore package.json README.md bin/generator  src/payload.schema.json pubdir/; cd dist ; cp -pr . ../pubdir/
scripts.presmoke: pnpm run pubdir ; cd pubdir ; pnpm pack
scripts.smoke: cd smoke; rm -f package.json; pnpm init ; pnpm install -f ../pubdir/wueste-*.tgz; npx wueste wueste-generator --write-test-schema --input-file ./generated/simple_type.schema.json --input-file ./node_modules/wueste/payload.schema.json --output-dir ./generated; npm_config_yes=true npx ts-node ./smoke.ts
